sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
affects something else
na tisto vpliva ali povzroči spremembo tistega.

seg.quote: ...the ways in which computers can affect our lives.

sense.def:
Kadar bolezen
affects someone
povzroči, da človek zboli.

seg.quote: The disease primarily affected Jane's lungs.

sense.def:
To affect a particular characteristic
pomeni delati se, kot da je določena lastnost za nas naravna;

seg.quote: He affected to despise every Briton he met.
